title: Otonari Biru ni Koi no Shisen
original_name: お隣りビルに恋の視線
sinopse: Mizuno Kazumi doesn't mind working in the old run-down office building, especially since it offers a great view of the building next door and the handsome guy who works there. There's nothing wrong with just looking, right? But is Mizuno the only one watching? (Source: MU)
